name: Butterfly Effect (lukki15)
description:
Be careful where you take your corners and don't make too many of them

Controls
WASD / Arrows - control the ship
R - reset to last save state

Download
The game is also as executable available, just download the zip file and execute inside the folder

Code
The game uses the Bevy framework and is written in Rust
The source code is available under: https://github.com/lukki15/butterfly-effect

Credits
Font: press-start form codeman38 (http://www.zone38.net/)
Art: Lunar Lander from mattwalkden (http://mattwalkden.itch.io)
Music: Parallel Worlds from Leon Kerner (https://leonkerner.com/)
